entry.title: Sharing block templates
entry.summary: The document in question outlines a draft for a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) available for review at [this GitHub link](https://github.com/ajtowns/bips/blob/a89b30349217728e6ff1c6690c909180376007c3/bip-ajtowns-sendtemplate.md). It invites readers to provide comments or reviews either directly on the linked page or by engaging with a specific Pull Request (PR) found [here](https://github.com/ajtowns/bips/pull/7). This initiative is part of a broader effort to solicit feedback from the community on proposed changes or enhancements to Bitcoin's protocol and infrastructure. The approach taken encourages open collaboration and discourse, ensuring that any modifications to the protocol are well-vetted and considered from multiple perspectives before implementation.
